title: The First Derivative
text: If f′ is greater than $$0$$, f is increasing. If f' is less than $$0$$, f is decreasing. If f is $$0$$ or undefined, it may be a local minimum or maximum.

title: Finding f'(x)
text: Find the derivative of f, and then solve to find when f'(x) is greater than $$0$$. What is the derivative of $$x^2+x+1$$?
